sentences.english: Methods 42 cases of rhegmatogenous retinal detachment had undergone scleral bulking surgery.
sentences.chinese: 方法42例孔源性非增生性視網膜脫離行鞏膜扣帶術。
最後完成鞏膜外墊壓或環扎。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and surgical method of occult scleral rupture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討隱匿性鞏膜破裂的診斷要點及手術方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the application of vitrectomy for scleral rupture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討玻璃體切除技術在鞏膜破裂傷中的應用。

sentences.english: Evaluate the difference between scleral tunnel incision and clear corneal incision.
sentences.chinese: 評價隧道鞏膜切口與透明角膜切口的療效差異。

sentences.english: To discuss the mechanism of scleral expansion in therapying the presbyopia.
sentences.chinese: 探討鞏膜擴張術治療老視的機理。

sentences.english: They are caused by bleeding between the conjunctiva and the sclera.
sentences.chinese: 它們是由結膜和鞏膜間的出血造成的。

sentences.english: Cauterization of episcleral vein was used to set up rat's EIOP model.
sentences.chinese: 應用燒灼鞏膜靜脈的方法制作大鼠慢性EIOP模型。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 10 cases of occult scleral rupture were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧分析了10例隱匿性鞏膜破裂傷臨牀資料。

sentences.english: The dark-brown vascular coat of the eye between the sclera and the retina.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛鞏膜和視網膜之間深褐色的血管網。

sentences.english: The normally white sclera of the eyes is a good place on physical examination to look for icterus.
sentences.chinese: 因正常鞏膜呈白色，因此是檢查黃疸的很好部位。

sentences.english: Conclusions Scleral buckling is a beneficial method in treatment of retinal detachment in juveniles.
sentences.chinese: 結論兒童孔源性視網膜脫離的治療首選鞏膜外加壓術。

sentences.english: Objective Researching and discussing the clinical effects of trabeculectomy with adjustable sutured scleral flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鞏膜瓣可調整縫線小梁切除術的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical appearance of occult scleral rupture and its treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討隱匿性鞏膜破裂傷的臨牀表現和手術方法。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
